node.text:
Carl Satterwhite, owner of The RCF Group, is a member of our Supplier Diversity Advisory Council. Carl and his team are proving the value of diversity and how better representation is helping get to better ideas and business innovations. Learn why he is so passionate about the important role corporations play in developing diverse talent and leaders.
 
Throughout August, we’re celebrating #BlackBusinessMonth by sharing stories from our Black-owned suppliers to showcase how they’re cultivating more creativity, the best ideas, and innovative solutions by uplifting and supporting diverse communities. Read more on our #blog: https://us.pg.com/blogs/delivering-on-diversity/

shortcode_media.title: P&G | Black Business Month: RCF Group – Change Happens Through Diversity
